text: @NikkiHaley @standamericanow Do you, #MoscowMitch, #LadyG, #RaphaelCruz & the rest of the #GOP have the courage to stand up to 45**, who is responsible for 137,000 American deaths as he ignores the #CoronaVirus, & who is ignoring the fact that Russia is paying bounties to terrorists for dead American troops?
